mapper.sql: t.id AS id, t.task_type AS taskType, t.proc_inst_id AS procInstId, t.flow_id AS flowId, t.buss_id AS bussId, t.buss_table AS bussTable, t.node_id AS nodeId, t.node_name AS nodeName, t.node_def_id AS nodeDefId, t.parent_task_id AS parentTaskId, t.child_task_tag AS childTaskTag, t.finish_type AS finish_type, t.assign_user AS assignUser, t.claim_tag AS claimTag, t.claim_user AS claimUser, t. OWNER AS OWNER, t.assign_time AS assignTime, t.claim_time AS claimTime, t.pass_str AS passStr, t.finish_tag AS finishTag, t.finish_user AS finishUser, t.finish_time AS finishTime, t.duration AS duration, t.description AS description, t.withdraw_tag AS withdrawTag, t.retreat_tag AS retreatTag, t.withdraw_description AS withdrawDescription, t.retreat_description AS retreatDescription, t.create_time_mills AS createTimeMills, t.execution_type AS executionType, t.execution_order AS execution_order, t.priority AS priority, t.emergency_tag AS emergencyTag, t.lock_tag AS lockTag, t.`create_time` AS createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gw_run_task t WHERE 1=1 AND t.assign_user = '${assignUser}' AND t.finish_tag = 'N' AND t.finish_type='single'
AND t.proc_inst_id IN ( SELECT g.proc_inst_id FROM gw_run_variables g)
AND t.id IN( SELECT g.task_id FROM gw_run_variables g)
ORDER BY ${orderByType} LIMIT ${pass_page},${limit}

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM gw_run_task t WHERE 1=1 AND t.assign_user = '${assignUser}' AND t.finish_tag = 'N' AND t.finish_type='single'
AND t.proc_inst_id IN ( SELECT g.proc_inst_id FROM gw_run_variables g)
AND t.id IN( SELECT g.task_id FROM gw_run_variables g)
